title: How to Get Rid of House Flies with Cloves

steps.title: Take a sweet and ripe apple (any kind).
steps.content: Take a sweet and ripe apple (any kind).

steps.title: Poke the cloves randomly into the apple.
steps.content: Poke the cloves randomly into the apple. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the newly clove-decorated apple on a plate and place it in the middle of the picnic table.
steps.content: Place the newly clove-decorated apple on a plate and place it in the middle of the picnic table.

steps.title: Watch.
steps.content: Watch. You will be amazed to see how all of a sudden all the flies disappear in a short time. They simply hate the subtle smell of the cloves [3] X Research source and will never come again to “share your meal" as long as you have this ornamental clove apple on the table. Enjoy your food.
